name: Agilitas Learning Private Limited
description: Agilitas Learning is a Learning and Digital Transformation consultancy and solution provider.....we work across industries and institutions to help formulate, develop, deliver and institutionalise Learning and Capability development solutions that enables the transformation of their organisation and people to be ready and successful in the Future Economy.
features: we engage and work with practitioners/subject matter experts
we are the architects of the solutions
our associates and strategic partners in delivering the services and solutions
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: ENABLING ORGANISATIONS BE AGILE FOR THE DIGITAL ECONOMY
ShortDescription: Agilitas Learning is a Learning and Digital Transformation consultancy and solution provider
enhanced_description: Agilitas Learning is a Learning and Digital Transformation consultancy and solution provider that enables organizations to be agile for the digital economy. They work across industries and institutions to help formulate, develop, deliver, and institutionalize learning and capability development solutions, aiming to transform organizations and people to be ready and successful in the Future Economy.
key_use_cases: Formulating and developing learning and capability development solutions
Delivering and institutionalizing learning solutions within organizations
Enabling organizational and people transformation for the Future Economy
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Engages and works with practitioners/subject matter experts
Acts as architects of the learning and digital transformation solutions
Leverages associates and strategic partners for service and solution delivery
implementation_scenarios: Consultancy-led implementation of learning and digital transformation strategies
Custom development and delivery of capability development solutions
Institutionalization of new learning processes and systems
roi_benefits: Organizational readiness for the Digital/Future Economy
Facilitates digital transformation through human capital development
